title: Hextech Crafting

replies.body:
The system is still up, but your droprate is probably really really low right now. Each key fragment you earn reduces the chances of earning the next key exponentially. This is because the droprate for keys is more of a curve than a line. The droprate resets approximately 30 days after the first key fragment dropped, so if you wait it out, you should start seeing more key fragments soon.

For more information, I definitely recommend checking out our [**Hextech Crafting Guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) Please let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you! Do you know when the system resets? Is it on a monthly basis?

As I mentioned before, the drop rate will reset ~30 days after the first key fragment drop.

Hope that helps, good luck! ^.^
Oh also, when you go into the help, and click on mastery token, I'm pretty sure the picture isnt there. Or at least its not loading for me. Hope I caught a bug or a typo?{{champion:32}}

So, basically, it's like this--you can get 6 key fragments in the first 2 days of your reset (it's different for everyone), and it'll take you another 28 days to get the other 6 key fragments. I count 12 key fragments, 4 keys total, because I've never got more than 4 keys each month since launch. I play quite a lot of games, too.

---You really don't need more than 4 keys anyway since you can only get 4 chests each month-- I guess this is on purpose.
